```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(worldfootballR)
library(ggrepel)
library(patchwork)
library(ggforce)
```

```{r}
big_5_pos_teams <- fb_big5_advanced_season_stats(season_end_year = 2024,
                                            stat_type = "possession",
                                            team_or_player = "team") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

big_5_pass_teams <- fb_big5_advanced_season_stats(season_end_year = 2024,
                                            stat_type = "passing",
                                            team_or_player = "team") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()


big_5_shot_teams <- fb_big5_advanced_season_stats(season_end_year = 2024,
                                            stat_type = "shooting",
                                            team_or_player = "team") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(id = row_number())
```
